channel.title: Chronomancer Poll
channel.description:
This is based on a class that @Icibalus created. https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-chronomancer-and-the-timesnatcher-classes/58810
> # [color=steblue]Chronomancer[/color] > **Blue Dragon Support** > > Pocket Dimension (Day) - Delay your death for 2 nights. This will delay bleeding and poison in addition to attacks. (2 uses) > > Time Warp (Night) - Delays a player's death for 2 days. This will delay bleeding and poison in addition to attacks. Will not prevent suicide. You can prevent a death multiple times. (Infinite uses) > > Distort Reality (Night) - Redirect a player's death you prevented with Time Warp to another player. Cannot redirect your own death. (Infinite uses)
## Do you want to see Physician replaced with Chronomancer? Herbalist would be replaced with an Unseen conversion. [poll type=regular max=20 public=true] * No * Yes [/poll]

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description: Read full topic

item.description:
and the funny thing is that it fits in the lore if you think about it, because medieval times is a time that a time traveler might go to to see whats up

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: TheSenate
item.description:
Ellie:

Groundhog Night (Night) - Everything that happens to your target tonight will also happen to them tommorow night, independent of any abilities. (2 uses)

how does this work? does this mean all attacks, occupies, etc. will hit 2 days later?

Does this include healing? because if someone was attacked and healed, would they be attacked and healed the next night?

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
Ellie:

People don’t like helping each other.

Like in real life.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
That’s a fringe case for when the reaper would perhaps want to kill the alchemist, most of the time unseen/cult/NK don’t even check him. I’ve explained it on the discord and on maybe a thread or two here, but you should never really aim for the alchemist because his heals dont affect your attacks. Your point is moot.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
… and the the Alchemist sides against the reaper and the reaper has no way of killing the alchemist. No.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
And perhaps make the alchemist immune to reap? Alchs don’t interact with reapers anyway because they bypass healing

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Making it so scum can kill Alchs that are healing others would be a great step

So yes

Do that

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Frankly, the Alchemist is a terrible spin on the Survivor, an already poor role design. If they are strong they become too much of a kingmaker while if they are weak it becomes impossible to win with them. I’d rather rework them into a BD class or rework them into true survivors, such as removing Stoneskin but allowing them to heal themselves as a survival mechanism.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
It has the power of persuasion

But honestly the problem there isn’t even that Alch can’t protect itself, it would be that all Alchs would always claim D1 because betting on a friendly Town is better than praying to not die N1

Read full topic

item.description:

Has nothing to help it achieve that goal

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Well, I agree that replacing the Alchemist could solve problems, not the problem that the Alchemist isn’t fun to play which doesn’t exist but the problems about alchemist ruining the play of others…
and that is why I originally suggested the Quack.

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
I’d just rework the Alchemist into a BD class with only one bomb, no night immunity, and an additional day ability for utility.

That class is just bad as it’s a pain to get rid of pro-BD Alchemists as scum and if you only get Alchemists as your healers then you basically depend on neutrals for protection and healing as BD.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
The only current solution is to spawn Alchemist even more often, which is not good for the fun of all other 15 people in game.
But maybe my Quack class suggestion could tackle this problem, too…

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Imo the way to make people less unhappy with Phys is to make him spawn less often. I like Phys but I keep getting him over and over again which makes me bored tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Ellie:

People are constantly complaining about Physician, so I wanted to see if there was actually interest for replacing it with a different class.

Well, you theoretically could replace it with this:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/the-quack-blue-dragon-killing/59101
It allows healing bleeding, but only limited,
it allows healing, but not chain healing,
and it can do even more…

But it was more intended to be an Alchemist than a Physician replacement, so I dunno…

Read full topic

item.title: Chronomancer Poll

item.description:
I like lowering the phys spawn rate, it’s one of those claims that gets screwed over due to claim space for it.
